Alias Grace (miniseries) – Wikipedia ^(http://www.sspxjk.co/check/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alias_Grace_(miniseries))

Alias Grace is a Canadian television miniseries directed by Mary Harron and starring Sarah Gadon. It is based on Margaret Atwood ’s 1996 novel of the same name and adapted by Sarah Polley . The series consists of six episodes. [1]

Original network: CBC Television (Canada), Netflix (international)
